title: Blending Existentialist and Constructionist Approaches in Leadership Studies: An Exploratory Account
abstract: NoThis paper aims to explore the contribution of combined social constructionist and existential perspectives to the understanding of leadership and calls for a reconsideration of the objectivist, functionalist assumptions and approaches to leadership. It aims to argue the value of incorporating the subjective perspective through two related approache
